navigationLinks.title: Cloudflare One
navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare's Secure Access Service Edge that delivers network as a service (NaaS) with Zero Trust security built-in

navigationLinks.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust
navigationLinks.description: Reduce risks, increase visibility, and eliminate complexity as employees connect to applications and the Internet

navigationLinks.title: Access
navigationLinks.description: Zero Trust security for accessing your self-hosted and SaaS applications

navigationLinks.title: Browser Isolation
navigationLinks.description: Add-on Zero Trust browsing to Access and Gateway to maximize threat and data protection

navigationLinks.title: CASB
navigationLinks.description: Easily secure workplace tools, granularly control user access, and protect sensitive data

navigationLinks.description: Protect your organization's most sensitive data

navigationLinks.description: Cloud-native email security to protect your users from phishing and business email compromise

navigationLinks.description: Secure web gateway for protecting your users via device clients and your network

navigationLinks.description: Use the Internet for your corporate network with security built in, including Magic Firewall

navigationLinks.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN

navigationLinks.description: Connect your network infrastructure directly to the Cloudflare network

navigationLinks.description: Protect your IP infrastructure and Internet access from DDoS attacks

content.value: Each plan starts with the same baseline security controls designed to bring the power of Cloudflare's global edge network to secure users, devices and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access.

plansList.description: Best for teams under 50 users or proof-of-concept test runs.
plansList.supportResponse: Community forums available for tips and troubleshooting.

plansList.description: Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.
plansList.additionalTermsText: Add Browser Isolation for an additional $10 per user
plansList.supportResponse: Median initial response time of 4 hours, for urgent issues.

plansList.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.
plansList.additionalTermsText: Add Browser Isolation based on a custom quote per user
plansList.supportResponse: Median initial response time of 1 hour, for urgent issues.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Teams Free $0/ user
Teams Standard $7/ user
Teams Enterprise $14/ user

Support

Communication channels
Community forums
24x7x365 Chat / Email
24x7x365 Phone / 24x7x365 Chat / Email
Median initial email response time
N/A
4 hours
1 hour
Service level agreement (SLA)
100% uptime SLA
100% uptime SLA
Onboarding support
Specialist onboarding service

Reduce risk

Zero Trust Network Access
Secure Web Gateway
Recursive DNS Filters
Layer 7 Proxy Filters
Antivirus inspection
CASB
Firewall as-a-service
Remote Browser Isolation
Add on (natively-integrated)

Increase visibility

Activity log retention
24 hours
30 days
6 months
Categorized application groups for Shadow IT visibility
Identity-based country, state, and device detail views
Push logs to cloud storage or SIEMs

Consistent policy

Custom application, private network and Internet access policies
Unlimited
Unlimited
Unlimited
Authentication via enterprise and social IdPs
Security categories (13) via machine learning and threat intelligence feeds
Content categories (100+) for acceptable use
Custom block, allow, or decryption bypass lists
Granular HTTP and URL rules
File type controls
CSV-based bulk import for lists
Device posture using third-party integrations and Cloudflare

Secure connectivity

Client-based encrypted connections to the Internet (WARP client)
Win, Mac, iOS, Android, Linux*
Win, Mac, iOS, Android, Linux*
Win, Mac, iOS, Android, Linux*
Clientless secure access to self-hosted and SaaS applications
Private connections for self-hosted applications, IPs and hostnames (Cloudflare Tunnel)
Network-level security for physical locations
3
20
250
Editable IP network locations
*coming soon

Simple interoperability

Endpoint and mobility management integrations
Split-tunneling for local or VPN connectivity
Client self-enrollment for users on unmanaged devices
Customizable app launcher
Authentication supports multiple identity providers concurrently
Generic and custom connectors to support SAML and OIDC
Service token support for automated services
Certificate-based auth for IoT and other mTLS use cases

No performance sacrifices

Fastest, global edge network (200+ cities)
Fastest, global policy updates (<5 seconds)
Fastest, intelligent IP routing (<100ms)
Fastest, privacy-first DNS resolver (7-31ms)
Uptime SLA
100%
100%
Fastest Zero Trust browsing service (2x speed of others)
Add on
Add on
Get Started
Get Started
Contact Us

relatedBlades.title: Add-On: Zero Trust Browser Isolation
relatedBlades.copy:
Faster than any legacy remote browser. Natively integrated in the Cloudflare for Teams policy builder, allowing administrators to allow, block, or isolate any security or content category and application group.

__See Standard or Enterprise plans for pricing__

featureList.title: Execute all browser code in the cloud
featureList.description: Execute all browser code in the cloud

relatedBlades.title: Use Standard Access or Standard Gateway separately
relatedBlades.copy: Only solving for limited use cases today? Contractors, mergers or acquisitions need access? VPN split-tunneling causing blindness in your gateway? We can help!

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
